items.text: Ensure all button text uses uppercase letters
Ensure that the ratings reminder shows every 8th time the app is launched
Ensure that the ratings reminder does not show anymore if the user taps 'No Thanks'
Ensure that the ratings reminder shows again later if the user taps 'Remind Me Later'
Ensure email content matches whatever the user is currently viewing
Ensure emails for I Ching consultations contain the correct changing lines
Ensure an error alert appears when the user attempts to email without having an email account set up on the device
